title: April Brader, Dom Acupuncturist & Herbalist | Saint Petersburg, FL
description: April Brader, DOM Acupuncturist & Herbalist provides Alternative Healing, Health and Wellness Coaching services. See their reviews & get quotes today.
cleaned_text: the customer know about your pricing (e.g., discounts, fees)? For a comprehensive medical evaluation for Traditional Chinese Medicine with Nutritional Counseling, Acupuncture OR Homeopathic Biopuncture Injection Therapy, Cupping, Moxa, etc. I charge $200.00 for my initial consultation and treatment. Any Herbal Therapies prescribed are extra and vary per patient. For Biopuncture Injection Therapy for Beauty - $200.00 For cupping - $100 For nutrition therapy - $100 Moxa - $100 Meditation Instruction - $100 - What is your typical process for working with a new customer? I arrange a mutually agreed upon time to visit the patient in the comfort of their own home. I take the required amount of time with each patient to treat them with different modalities and help them on their healing journey. - What education and/or training do you have that relates to your work? I have been an Herbalist for 20 years and I am currently a licensed Acupuncture Physician in the State of Florida with an additional certification in Homeopathic Biopuncture Injection Therapy for beauty, pain, disease, illnesses, COPD, auto immune disease, etc.
